snippet.title: REPO MAN | Official Reveal Trailer | Open-World RPG
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1065740/Repo_Man/

In this quirky first-person RPG you are a repo man - a debt collector.

Track down debtors, claim their assets, strike deals, deceive, seduce, intimidate. Solve mysteries, uncover conspiracies and dabble in the occult. Mingle among the high society and delve into the shadow demimonde of crime and superstition.

STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1065740/Repo_Man/
RELEASE DATE: 2023

FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/AcharaStudios
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/AcharaStudios
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/achara.studios/
DISCORD: https://discord.gg/NMyjFQr6dJ
WEB: http://achara.studio
